
input: stikprøvestørrelse og parameter
```{r}
meanFunc <- function(sample_pop,i){mean(sample_pop[i])}
```

```{r}
library(boot)
sand_middel <- 8/(8+2)
reees <- replicate(100,{
  stik <- rbeta(3, 8, 2)
  boot_stik <- boot(stik, statistic = meanFunc, 100)
  interval_perc <- suppressWarnings(boot.ci(boot_stik)$percent[4:5])
  tf <- interval_perc[1]<=sand_middel & interval_perc[2]>=sand_middel
})
table(reees)
```
```{r}
stik <- rbeta(100, 8, 2)
boot_stik <- boot(stik, statistic = meanFunc, 100)
interval_perc <- boot.ci(boot_stik)$percent[4:5]
interval_perc[1]<=sand_middel & interval_perc[2]>=sand_middel
```
```{r}

interval_basic <- boot.ci(boot_stik)$basic[4:5]
interval_basic[1]<=sand_middel & interval_basic[2]>=sand_middel
interval_normal <- boot.ci(boot_stik)$normal[2:3]
interval_normal[1]<=sand_middel & interval_normal[2]>=sand_middel
```

output: dækningsgraden
